Copycat API Reference (latest)

Raft client 
Package Description
io.atomix.copycat.client
Provides classes for communicating with a Raft cluster and submitting commands and queries.
io.atomix.copycat.client.error
Raft client error classes and utilities.
io.atomix.copycat.client.request
Request implementations for all client communication.
io.atomix.copycat.client.response
Response implementations for all client communication.
io.atomix.copycat.client.session
Classes and interfaces for managing client sessions.
Raft server 
Package Description
io.atomix.copycat.server
Provides a standalone, feature-complete implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
io.atomix.copycat.server.request
Request implementations for server-to-server communication.
io.atomix.copycat.server.response
Response implementations for server-to-server communication.
io.atomix.copycat.server.session
Interfaces for managing client sessions on a Raft server.
io.atomix.copycat.server.storage
Provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.
io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.compaction
Classes and interfaces that support efficient Raft log compaction.
io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.entry
Provides entry implementations for the Raft log.
Other Packages 
Package Description
io.atomix.copycat.server.state
Internal classes that manage RaftServer state.
io.atomix.copycat.server.util
